channel.title: Possible to change objects facing direction?
channel.description:
Is it possible to change the way an object faces? like say you want an altar to face east, but its facing north, is it possible to change? Heres my code for the object:
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(409, 2532, 3309, 0, 10);//Prayer Altar

item.title: Possible to change objects facing direction?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

[quote=“h3rbl0re, post:1, topic:381149”]Is it possible to change the way an object faces? like say you want an altar to face east, but its facing north, is it possible to change?

Heres my code for the object: [quote]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(409, 2532, 3309, 0, 10);//Prayer Altar[/quote][/quote]

change that “0” to “1 or 2 or 3” im not sure which is which direction though, so ure gona hve to play around with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to change objects facing direction?
